page.title: 19Annual Events
page.content: The{Rempstone Steam Rally}takes place in July outside the village.Old tractors,steam engines and radio-controlled planes are displayed, while there are some side shows and miscellaneous stalls. On Boxing Day the{Rempstone Annual {Village Football Match}takes place on the village playing field.Anyone,whatever age or sex may take part,the sides are unlimited and chaos rules. In Costock on Boxing Day there is also an{Annual Village Football {Tournament}involving several teams from in and around the village.A village{Hockey Match}also takes place on the same day.Coffee is supplied afterwards in the Village Hall. A float is usually made for Christmas Eve.This carries Father Christmas. { }
